pma:database.name: webtoon_hub
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `products` ( `id` int(12) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `link` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `product_type_id` int(3) unsigned NOT NULL, `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `product_type_id` (`product_type_id`), CONSTRAINT `products_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`product_type_id`) REFERENCES `product_type` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `user_roles` ( `id` int(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `user_id` int(6) unsigned NOT NULL, `role_id` int(3) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `user_id` (`user_id`), KEY `role_id` (`role_id`), CONSTRAINT `user_roles_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `user_roles_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`role_id`) REFERENCES `roles` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;

CREATE TABLE `webtoons` ( `id` int(6) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `title` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `author` varchar(256) NOT NULL, `genre` varchar(48) DEFAULT NULL, `image` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `link` varchar(256) DEFAULT NULL, `likes` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT NULL, `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `title` (`title`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
